snippet: ANGELO--John. Central Park Conservancy mourns the passing of John Angelo, devoted husband of our friend and Board member, Judy Hart Angelo. On behalf of the Board of Trustees, management, and staff of Central Park Conservancy, we send our heartfelt condolences to the entire Angelo family. 1/3
lead_paragraph: ANGELO--John. Central Park Conservancy mourns the passing of John Angelo, devoted husband of our friend and Board member, Judy Hart Angelo. On behalf of the Board of Trustees, management, and staff of Central Park Conservancy, we send our heartfelt condolences to the entire Angelo family. 1/3
